about_the_game:
Partner up!

Brick Buddies is a turbulent couch co-op construction game for 2 players. Take control of one of the wobbly buddies, who both share a crane, and work together to construct epic buildings - or at least something that doesn’t immediately collapse. The higher you build, the more points you cash in. The shakier the whole thing gets, the more your friendship is put to the test! But beware - the innocent-looking sheep want to turn your building dreams into nightmares.

Co-operation is key!

Both buddies are responsible for different tasks on the job. Rotating the crane, picking up building blocks and honking away aggressive sheep have to be coordinated to finish the job on time and with minimal collateral damage.

Features, aka The Fun Stuff:


  • BRICK-TACULAR MECHANICS: Partner up and dive into the chaotic co-op construction fun with easy to learn but hard to master duo-crane controls. Communicate, stack building blocks and honk away the sweet but sneaky sheep. Try out different strategies on multiple maps and become pro-builders in career mode or construct the ultimate skyscraper in endless mode!

  • CAREER MODE : For those who want a bit of direction in their mayhem. Fulfill incerasingly complex and wacky contracts, try to finish all the bonus goals and rise as the master builders... or at least the ones that laugh the most.

  • ENDLESS MODE: Ever wondered how high you can stack without toppling over or being ambushed by a sheep? Here's your playground. Race the clock, beat your score, and remember to breathe!

So, what are you waiting for? Grab your trusty sidekick (preferably human, not sheep), crash on that comfy couch, and let the bricklaying (and sheep-dodging) madness begin!
Ready, set, build!
